code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./FormContainer.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FormContainer=()=>{const[isLoginActive,setIsLoginActive]=useState(true);const handleLoginClick=()=>{setIsLoginActive(true);};const handleSignupClick=()=>{setIsLoginActive(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title-text",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title ".concat(isLoginActive?'login':'signup'),children:isLoginActive?'Login':'Signup'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slide-controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",name:"slide",id:"login",checked:isLoginActive,readOnly:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",name:"slide",id:"signup",checked:!isLoginActive,readOnly:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"login",className:"slide login",onClick:handleLoginClick,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"signup",className:"slide signup",onClick:handleSignupClick,children:"Signup"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slider-tab"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{action:"#",className:"login ".concat(isLoginActive?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"field",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Email Address",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"field",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",required:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pass-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",children:"Forgot password?"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"field btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"btn-layer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signup-link",children:["Not a member?
